001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic;
002
003public abstract class PntUtils {
004        
005        public static Pnt2d centroid(Pnt2d[] pts) {
006                final int n = pts.length;
007                double sx = 0;
008                double sy = 0;
009                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
010                        sx = sx + pts[i].getX();
011                        sy = sy + pts[i].getY();
012                }
013                return Pnt2d.from(sx/n, sy/n);
014        }
015        
016        public static double[][] toDoubleArray(Pnt2d[] pts) {
017                final int n = pts.length;
018                double[][] pa = new double[n][2];
019                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
020                        pa[i][0] = pts[i].getX();
021                        pa[i][1] = pts[i].getY();
022                }
023                return pa;
024        }
025        
026        public static Pnt2d[] fromDoubleArray(double[][] pa) {
027                final int n = pa.length;
028                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[n];
029                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
030                        pts[i] = Pnt2d.from(pa[i]);
031                }
032                return pts;
033        }
034        
035}
